member.name: EMREXTCREATEPEN
member.summary: The EMREXTCREATEPEN structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record. If the record contains a structure, it is followed by the bitmap bits that form a packed device-independent bitmap (DIB).

member.summary: Size of brush bitmap bits, if any.
